A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I made this account just to review this movie.

I grew up with SW\, and this absolutely ruined it for me.  

The build up to see Luke\, but to find instead a cowardly fool that resembled nothing like his original character is heartbreaking.

Watching Princess Laei was painful to watch\, as was her second in command.  They had conspicuous roles that looked more about making a statement about feminism than playing any role or adding to the story line in any meaningful way.

Sadly I cannot recommend this movie\, and I am shocked that the critics are giving this any decent review.  The magic is gone\, replaced by something hard to describe - but it smells pungent and rotten.
